query: Which of the three companies had the highest gross margin in 2023?
answer: Cost of revenue increased $10.4 billion or 20% driven by growth in Microsoft Cloud. Gross margin percentage decreased slightly. Microsoft Cloud gross margin percentage increased 2 points to 72%. The three companies had the highest gross margin in 2023.
reasoning: Used agent decomposition with 3 sub-queries and hf LLM for synthesis.
